name: Lighthead and the Lighthouse
description:
Welcome to Lighthead and the Lighthouse! Take control of Lighthead, who's tired of shadows invading his beloved Lighthouse. To stop the invasion, he's transformed his backyard into a trap-filled battlefield, with towers that illuminate any enemy in their path!

Collect resources and fireflies to construct towers, strategically placing them to defend your Lighthouse. Rinse and repeat this process to repel the shadowy hordes.

Controls:
WASD - Walk
E - Interact with Resources
1,2,3  - Select Towers
4 or 0 - Deselect Towers
Left Mouse Button - Place Tower
Right Mouse Button - Rotate Tower by 45 degrees

Get ready to defend your Lighthouse against the shadows and show them who's boss!

Submission for Farmando XP First Game Jam . All assets were made within the span of the project, and external assets and tools are permitted for use.
